modules.description: Calculates the memory overhead associated with a given heap size based on configuration parameters. It processes integer values representing heap size and configuration settings to determine the additional memory required. This is used to estimate memory usage in system simulations or resource planning.

Adjusts the garbage collector's aggressiveness by modifying the space_overhead parameter based on major heap size. Operates on OCaml's Gc module and heap statistics to dynamically influence collection frequency. Useful for applications that need to balance memory usage and performance under varying load conditions.

Calculates memory overhead from heap size and configuration parameters, returning integer estimates for resource planning. It processes input values through specialized arithmetic operations to model system memory usage. Users can predict additional memory needs for different heap sizes and configurations. This enables precise simulation of memory constraints in dynamic environments.
